title: CSB Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 03 Junior Research Fellow and Other Posts
description: The Central Silk Board (CSB) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 03 Junior Research Assistant and Project Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Sc, M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the CSB Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, educational details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the address given below. If y...
